hero.title: Stroppy - Database Testing Framework
hero.subtitle: Deploy clusters in the cloud, run load tests and simulate failures to test the reliability of your databases

features.title: Main Features
features.subtitle: Stroppy provides a complete set of tools for testing database reliability and performance

cloud.title: Cloud Deployment
cloud.description: Deployment of a cluster of virtual machines in the selected cloud via Terraform. Supported options are Yandex.Cloud and Oracle.Cloud

kubernetes.title: Kubernetes Integration
kubernetes.description: Deployment of a Kubernetes cluster inside a running cluster of virtual machines with automatic management

databases.title: Database Support
databases.description: Support for FoundationDB, MongoDB, CockroachDB and PostgreSQL with cluster deployment capabilities

monitoring.title: Monitoring & Analytics
monitoring.description: Integration with Grafana for collecting k8s cluster statistics and virtual machine system metrics

about.title: About Stroppy
about.description: Stroppy is a framework for testing various types of databases. It allows you to deploy a cluster in the cloud, run load tests and simulate different failures, such as network unavailability of one of the nodes in the cluster.
about.techDescription: To complicate the task for the DBMS, Stroppy may try to deliberately break the DB cluster, because in the real world failures happen much more often than we want.
